pinyin: yi3 xian1 an4 bi3 luo4 wan2 tong2

sentences.english: Polypropylene is used for standard clamps and Polyamide or Aluminum for special applications.
sentences.chinese: 聚丙烯是标准夹具和聚酰胺或特殊应用铝的使用。

sentences.english: Glutamine combined with rush had some synergetic effect on supporting bowel barrier function.
sentences.chinese: 联合应用谷氨酰胺和生长激素可改善肠粘膜功能。

sentences.english: Conclusion Polyacrylamide gel electrophoresis technology can be used for seed identification of Andrographis paniculata seeds.
sentences.chinese: 结论聚丙烯酰胺凝胶电泳手艺可用于穿心莲种子剖断。

sentences.english: In this paper, p-methylphenyl sulphonylamine was used to modify urea formaldehyde resin with low molar ratio.
sentences.chinese: 用对甲基苯磺酰胺改性低克分子比的脲醛树脂。

sentences.english: Since then a great deal of research has been focused on acrylamide.
sentences.chinese: 从这以后，很多研究者将目光转移到丙烯酰胺。

sentences.english: They urged the food industry to reduce levels of acrylamide in their products.
sentences.chinese: 他们敦促食品行业要减少产品中丙稀酰胺的含量。

sentences.english: Weinreb amide can easily be reduced to aldehyde by metal hydride.
sentences.chinese: Weinreb酰胺也易于被金属氢化物还原为醛。

sentences.english: Fibroin obtained from degummed raw silk was studied by sodium dodecyl sulphate polyacrylamide gel electrophoresis.
sentences.chinese: 用聚丙烯酰胺凝胶电泳研究了从生丝脱胶获得的丝素。

sentences.english: The research on suppression of gene transcription by polyamide was reviewed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文总结了聚酰胺对特定基因转录抑制的研究进展。

sentences.english: And in laboratory experiments with blood vessels from rats, they were able to inhibit ceramide synthesis.
sentences.chinese: 并在实验与血管从老鼠，它们能抑制神经酰胺合成。

sentences.english: The parties and the glam factor is through the roof.
sentences.chinese: 聚会和谷氨酰胺因素烧穿了屋顶。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the relationship between ceramide and apoptosis of granulosa cells.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨神经酰胺与颗粒细胞凋亡的关系。

sentences.english: The poly (amic acid) exhibited good solubility in common organic solvents.
sentences.chinese: 该聚酰胺酸在普通有机溶剂中具有良好的可溶性。

sentences.english: It reacted with amides to give corresponding selenoamides in fairly good yields.
sentences.chinese: 它与酰胺反应以较好的产率给出相应的硒代酰胺。

sentences.english: It reacted with amides to give corresponding selenoamides in fairly good yields.
sentences.chinese: 它与酰胺反应以较好的产率给出相应的硒代酰胺。

sentences.english: Twelve different thioxanthone carboxylic amides derivatives are prepared.
sentences.chinese: 合成了十二种噻吨酮酰胺类光引发剂。
